name: Primary
description: For children 3 to 6 years this is a Montessori school. The children receive private and small group lessons by their AMI or AMS certified guide in the main areas of the classroom (math, language, sensorial and practical life).
fullDescription: For children 3 to 6 years this is a Montessori school. The children receive private and small group lessons by their AMI or AMS certified guide in the main areas of the classroom (math, language, sensorial and practical life).
whatTheyOffer: For children 3 to 6 years this is a Montessori school. The children receive private and small group lessons by their AMI or AMS certified guide in the main areas of the classroom (math, language, sensorial and practical life).
howToGetIt: To apply follow the multi-step process outlined here.
cost: This is a fee based service with tuition assistance available.
agency: The Dahlia Schools of San Francisco
